ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisRe-appointment of RENU KAPOOR of Regina, Saskatchewan, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months.
